metadata.description: 20 specialized AI agents for social science research workflow with VS (Verbalized Sampling) methodology

plugins.name: research-coordinator
plugins.description: Master coordinator with context-aware auto-dispatch for 20 research agents. Analyzes conversation to automatically activate appropriate agents with VS methodology.

plugins.name: 01-research-question-refiner
plugins.description: Refines and structures research questions with FINER/PICO frameworks and VS methodology

plugins.name: 02-theoretical-framework-architect
plugins.description: Designs theoretical frameworks with full VS 5-phase process for theory discovery

plugins.name: 03-devils-advocate
plugins.description: Challenges assumptions and identifies weaknesses with full VS methodology

plugins.name: 04-research-ethics-advisor
plugins.description: Reviews research ethics including IRB requirements and informed consent

plugins.name: 05-systematic-literature-scout
plugins.description: Conducts systematic literature searches following PRISMA guidelines with full VS process

plugins.name: 06-evidence-quality-appraiser
plugins.description: Appraises evidence quality using established assessment frameworks

plugins.name: 07-effect-size-extractor
plugins.description: Extracts and calculates effect sizes for meta-analysis

plugins.name: 08-research-radar
plugins.description: Tracks latest research trends and emerging topics in the field

plugins.name: 09-research-design-consultant
plugins.description: Advises on research design including experimental and quasi-experimental methods

plugins.name: 10-statistical-analysis-guide
plugins.description: Guides statistical analysis selection with full VS 5-phase methodology

plugins.name: 11-analysis-code-generator
plugins.description: Generates R/Python analysis code for statistical procedures

plugins.name: 12-sensitivity-analysis-designer
plugins.description: Designs sensitivity analyses for robustness checking

plugins.name: 13-internal-consistency-checker
plugins.description: Checks internal consistency across research documents

plugins.name: 14-checklist-manager
plugins.description: Manages research checklists (PRISMA, CONSORT, STROBE, etc.)

plugins.name: 15-reproducibility-auditor
plugins.description: Audits research reproducibility and open science practices

plugins.name: 16-bias-detector
plugins.description: Detects research biases with full VS 5-phase methodology

plugins.name: 17-journal-matcher
plugins.description: Matches manuscripts to appropriate journals based on scope and impact

plugins.name: 18-academic-communicator
plugins.description: Assists with academic communication including abstracts and cover letters

plugins.name: 19-peer-review-strategist
plugins.description: Develops strategies for responding to peer review feedback

plugins.name: 20-preregistration-composer
plugins.description: Composes preregistration documents for OSF and other platforms
